idea-plugin.name: Base16 Rebecca
idea-plugin.vendor: Victor Borja (http://github.com/vic) based on Rebecca Theme (http://github.com/vic/rebecca-theme), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Rebecca for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Victor Borja (http://github.com/vic) based on Rebecca Theme (http://github.com/vic/rebecca-theme). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
